titles.title: DFC Modernization Act of 2025
DFC Modernization Act of 2025
To modify and reauthorize the Better Utilization of Investments Leading to Development Act of 2018, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 28 - 23.
